name: Guardians and Golems
description:
Guardians and Golems is 4 Player Asymmetrical Battle Arena game.

One player on each team controls a Golem, a melee focused brawler that used his abilities to defeat the enemy Golem. The other player controls the Guardian; a omniscient being that interacted by taking control of conduit scattered thoroughout the map, by working together to take control of a conduit, the Guardian is able to unleash powerful abilities to aid his Golem in combat. 

You need a controller to play! Currently supports 2 - 4 Players only (sorry :()

Controls:

Golems:
Left Stick: Move
Right Stick: Aim Abilities
X Button: Melee
B Button: Dash/Roll
Left Bumper: Ability 1
Left Trigger: Ability 2
Right Bumper: Ability 3
Right Trigger: Ability 4

Guardians:
Left Stick: Move Between Conduits
Right Stick: Aim Abilities
X Button: Capture Conduit
Left Bumper: Ability 1
Left Trigger: Ability 2
Right Bumper: Ability 3
Right Trigger: Ability 4
